text:
Dear @NCDCgov, @chikwe_I, @DrEOEhanire, Please stop @NafdacAgency from making this move. Millions of Nigerians are at risk, please clear the air to ensure your efforts don't turn out to be counterproductive.
Make a statement on this #chloroquine issue. 

https://t.co/8ufMlYWjdl https://t.co/CTeTJ2Ozdh
